description: This file defines a workflow for fetching top Hacker News stories, generating a report, and outputting it, utilizing various agents, tools, and storage mechanisms.

classes.name: HackerNewsReporter
classes.description: A workflow class that fetches top Hacker News stories, generates a report, and outputs it.

methods.name: get_top_hackernews_stories
methods.description: Fetches top stories from Hacker News API and returns them as a JSON string.

methods.name: run
methods.description: Executes the workflow: retrieves top stories, generates a report, and yields responses.
